scripts.build: npm run purge && npm run minify
scripts.purge: purgecss --css css/main.css css/pages.css css/unified-styles.css --content *.php includes/*.php js/*.js --output css/production/
scripts.minify: cleancss -o css/production/main.min.css css/production/main.css && cleancss -o css/production/pages.min.css css/production/pages.css && cleancss -o css/production/unified-styles.min.css css/production/unified-styles.css
scripts.watch: echo 'Следите за изменениями в оригинальных CSS файлах'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Готово к деплою!'
